description:
This is a wonderful torrent client. It has everything that you need and more. Easily download and share your favorite things. Ktorrent has the ability to classify anything you're downloading/uploading. For example if you only want to see the distros you're sharing then you can put them all in one category and see only them.
Lots more too.

KTorrent supports most-any feature you could want, as well as a variety of features available as plug-ins that many torrent clients don't support. The interface displays a tonne of information for you to study, though how much of it is necessary depends on who you ask.
The best torrent client for KDE users. It has excelent desktop integration and it's very easy to use.
It provides all the necessary features that you want from a bittorrent client. It is also very lightweight and easier to use. I highly recommend it!
Small features well thought make it more enjoyable than others (if you use KDE)
Has all the features via plugins. Bug free and fast. Best torrent app out there.

It works well, but I prefer qBittorrent

pooopooo0poootf
It has many options which make it possible to finely customize it, giving me exactly what I want. This is an awesome torrenting client with a beautiful UI.
summary: Inarguably the best torrenting client I've used!

description: I've used many torrent clients over the years, most recently Deluge. After reinstalling Kubuntu due to a system issue, I discovered that KTorrent was preinstalled, so thought I would give it a shot. It turns out to be one of the best torrent clients I have ever used. It is feature-rich, yet easy to use with a clean and intuitive interface. If you like your torrents as much as I do, you owe it yourself to give KTorrent a shot!
Solid user interface, full featured client, looks good, i still prefer qbittorrent over ktorrent, but ktorrent is probably my second fav.
Easily my favourite torrent client.
It has everything that I needed. Thank you KDE Team

Regardless of the amount of active downloads it is very common that KTorrent crashes or closes when trying to open it from the tray or when opening a .magnet and it is really stressful because it becomes completely unresponsive after that crash, and in fact in many occasions it doesn't crash at all, the window just freezes. Oh, and opening a .magnet takes a long time, I don't know why, in other torrent clients that never happens.

Other than that, it works very well and integrates very well with KDE Plasma and for me it is superior to Qbittorrent, I love the fact that I can suspend all my torrents by pressing the middle click of my mouse.

I've been using KTorrent for years. In the past couple years it's been having more issues. For the past couple months, I've been unable to download many Linux ISOs, they keep getting stalled. Uploads work fine though. I just can't figure out what's going on.

Like most native KDE apps, this looks pretty with all the cute GUI widgets but doesn't perform well. There's no UPnP support and it seems to have trouble downloading from peers. I have one torrent I waited 2 days to start downloading, I gave-up and added the torrent via Transmission-QT and it started downloading immediately at a very high rate, even without UPnP enabled.

Never used it, never will. Uninstalling (Flatpak) leaves it broken in the App Launcher menus. I hate that. :( This is one of those apps that makes you wonder why it even exists. Why waste time working on it? Just contribute effort to qBittorrent, instead.
it looks nice and has a darkmode unlike alot of torrent clients, it's not any faster then most programs but not any slower
works well once you set it up correctly..

There doesnt apper to be a vpn killswitch However in settings you can select which network interface to use. But, despite being set to use the VPN interface, kTorrent will use whatever interface is up - or even switch if the chosen interface goes down. This is pretty silly if working as intended and a pretty big bug if not.
hatte damit anfangsschwierigkeiten, kubuntu-20, habe die anderen clients getestet, und mich doch für diesen entschieden.. optionen am besten konfigurierbar und keine "störungen"
Schlecht geworden in seiner Weiterentwicklung, nicht mehr selbstverständlich zu bedienen, kein Webinterface vorhanden und auch nicht zum nachinstallieren. Ist für mich nicht zu gebauchen!
summary: Nicht mehr dass was er mal war!

description: Creo que es bastante bueno y completo, tiene todas las funciones que busco, es rápido, estable y tiene bloqueador integrado. La única función que hecho de menos es la "descarga secuencial", dicha opción te permite ver un video con sólo haber descargado poco megas.
En Debian Buster con KDE, al activar el complemento del buscador, se queda bloqueado y hay que forzar el cierre de ventana.
summary: Se bloquea al activar el buscador

description: No permite descarga secuencial. Además, se abre solo al iniciar el sistema y no es fácil hacer que no lo haga. Para mi qBittorrent no tiene igual.
DEscarga muy bien y la función de apagar cuadno se cumplen las condiciones determinadas es genial.

description:
Va bien cumple con lo que promete, pero tengo un probleblama que molesta mucho que es que se traba a cada rato, cada vez que modifico algo o quiero abrir un menu se traba, pero no e encontrado otro fallo.

Como sugerencia le recomiendo poner un vizualizador de archivos multimedia para poder ver lo que contengan los archivos antes de descargarlos completamente.
summary: Simple y efectivo pero con un fallo

description: excellent client torrent

certe malgré toutes les fonctionnalités je trouve l'accélération de téléchargements lente. pour ma je proposerait flareget malgré le faite quelle est payant ou mieux encore XDM (http://xdman.sourceforge.net/) pour sa gratuité et son effacité notable dans les téléchargements . j'invite donc les developpeurs à jeter un oeil sur XDM et IDM (uniquement sur windows) pour améliorer notablement ce logiciel merci à vous.
c est sympa linux
Fais le taf...

Ktorrent fonctionne vraiment bien, il a de nombreuses fonctionalités, mais les fonctionnalités basiques sont faciles d'accès. Le Seul point noir à mon gout, c'est l'interface que je trouve viellissante. Elle aurait besoin d'être modernisée ne serait-ce que pour rendre accessible les fonctions avancés du logiciel.

N'ouvre tout simplement pas sur Ubuntu Budgie 20.04. L'icône est dans le dock, mais aucune fenêtre. De plus, dans le lanceur d'applications, il y a deux logiciels Ktorrrent avec une icône différente. Bizarre...

Программа имеет отличный внешний вид, качает с нормальной скоростью, но постоянно запускается сама зачастую в большем разрешении чем мой экран из за чего не видно кнопки выключения. Приходится использовать alt+F3.
В Кубунту 18.04 при выключении программы остаётся висеть в активных процессах. И если процесс не убить через системный монитор - при следующем включении компьютера стартует автозапуском.
